Package javax.jaxtx.acid

Interface Summary
ACIDTransaction Instances of this interface represent specific ACID transactions.
ACIDTransactionManager This is the service side component of the user interface.
RecoveryCoordinator Whenever a two-phase participant is registered with a transaction it receives an instance of a RecoveryCoordinator that may be used upon failure-recovery to complete the commit protocol.
Status This enumeration represents the states that a transaction and participants may be in.
Synchronization This is the interface that all synchronization participants must define.
TwoPhaseParticipant This is the interface that all two-phase commit aware participants must define.
UserACIDTransaction The user portion of the transaction API.
Vote This enumeration represents the possible vote results that a participant can return from prepare.
 

Exception Summary
HeuristicCommitException Thrown if a participant or transaction commit when the request was to roll back.
HeuristicHazardException Thrown if the outcome of at least one participant is unknown.
HeuristicMixedException Thrown if some of the participants commit while others rollback.
HeuristicRollbackException Thrown if the participants rolled back when the request was to commit.
InvalidTransactionException Thrown if the transaction (or imported context) is invalid.
NoTransactionException Thrown if no transaction is associated with the current thread.
NotSupportedException Thrown if the implementation does not support nested transactions.
SystemException Thrown if an unexpected error occurs.
TransactionCommittedException Thrown if the transaction commits rather than rolls back.
TransactionRolledBackException Thrown if the transaction rolls back rather than commits.
UnknownTransactionException Thrown if the transaction is unknown.
WrongStateException Thrown if the state of the transaction is inconsistent with the attempted operation.
